attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: Type of the reimbursing agency. Values: Federal, State, Local, Other

element.name: Name
element.desc: The name of the reimbursing agency. This element is to be used when the Type is set as Other.

element.name: MealStatus
element.desc: Student meal status. If a meal status applies, either MealStatus (for students), or EarnedStatus (for staff) is specified.

element.name: EarnedStatus
element.desc: Staff meal status.

element.name: Tax
element.desc: Dollar value of tax collected.

element.name: Value
element.desc: The value of the count.

attribute.name: SIF_RefId
attribute.desc: GUID of the SIF customer type.

attribute.name: SIF_RefObject
attribute.desc: SIF customer type. If the type is StaffPersonalRefId then EarnedStatus is included. If the type is StudentPersonalRefId, then MealStatus in included.

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: Earned status type.

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: Date on which earned status became effective (inclusive).

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: Date on which earned status was last in effect. This attribute is conditional upon the StartDate element. It exists only if the StartDate element exists.

value.name: DAIRY
value.desc: Dairy: butter, cheese, eggs, milk, yogurt

value.name: FATS
value.desc: Fats and oils: margarine, shortening, mayonnaise, salad dressings

value.name: BAKED
value.desc: Baked goods: breads, cakes, cookies, crackers, pies, rolls

value.name: PURCHASED_LUNCH
value.desc: Purchased mixed dishes – lunch entrees/main dishes (pizza, etc)

value.name: PURCHASED_BREAKFAST
value.desc: Purchased mixed dishes – breakfast entrees/main dishes

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies this item

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: Item number as presented to user.

element.name: Description
element.desc: Description of Item

element.name: ElectronicIdList
element.desc: Electronic identifier(s) associated with this item.

element.name: ItemCategory
element.desc: The category is derived from the Child Nutrition Database's food category codes/names (Source: Food Category Name File [CNDB]). Agents may use the actual codes or a district's local definition of the names associated with the codes. The Child Nutrition Database [CNDB] is updated on a yearly basis by the USDA.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies this item's portion

element.name: FoodserviceItemUnitRefId
element.desc: GUID that identifies related item portion

element.name: ItemPortionQuantity
element.desc: Quantity of item portion (number of units)

element.name: ItemPortionType
element.desc: Type of item unit

element.name: Description
element.desc: Optional description of amount

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies this object

element.name: SchoolInfoRefId
element.desc: GUID that identifies the school for this object

element.name: Date
element.desc: Date of sales

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies this unit

element.name: FoodserviceItemRefId
element.desc: GUID that identifies related item

element.name: Description
element.desc: Description of unit ("cup", "teaspoon", etc.)

element.name: MeasureDescriptionCode
element.desc: Child Nutrition Database [CNDB] standard code describing unit. The database is updated on a yearly basis by the USDA.

element.name: GramWeight
element.desc: Gram weight of this item in terms of MeasureDescriptionCode

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies this meal price.

element.name: SchoolInfoRefId
element.desc: GUID that identifies the school this meal price belongs to

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies this menu plan

element.name: SchoolInfoRefId
element.desc: GUID that identifies the school for this menu plan

element.name: MenuPlanDate
element.desc: Date of menu plan

element.name: Description
element.desc: Description of menu plan

element.name: ProjectedParticipation
element.desc: Feeding figure projected

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies the daily milk sales object

element.name: SchoolInfoRefId
element.desc: School for which the sales object applies

element.name: Date
element.desc: Date on which the sales occurred.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies purchase transaction

element.name: FoodserviceTransactionRefId
element.desc: GUID that identifies food service transaction in which this purchase was made

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies this object.

element.name: SchoolInfoRefId
element.desc: GUID that identifies the school.

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: Effective start date for the reimbursement rates

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: Effective end date for the reimbursement rates

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies the daily meal sales object

element.name: SchoolInfoRefId
element.desc: School for which the sales object applies

element.name: Date
element.desc: Date on which the sales occurred.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: Reference to SchoolInfo

attribute.name: Date
attribute.desc: Date the count is taken.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies the daily meal sales object

element.name: SchoolInfoRefId
element.desc: School for which the sales object applies

element.name: Date
element.desc: Date on which the sales occurred.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: Reference to SchoolInfo

attribute.name: Date
attribute.desc: Date the count is taken.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies the daily meal sales object

element.name: SchoolInfoRefId
element.desc: School for which the sales object applies

element.name: Date
element.desc: Date on which the sales occurred.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies food service transaction

element.name: SchoolInfoRefId
element.desc: GUID that identifies the school/site of account transaction

element.name: TransactionDate
element.desc: Date of transaction

element.name: TransactionTime
element.desc: Time of transaction.

element.name: Tax
element.desc: Amount of tax.

element.name: Description
element.desc: Description of the Transaction

element.name: Voided
element.desc: This flag tells us if the transaction is voided.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies transaction details

element.name: FoodserviceTransactionRefId
element.desc: GUID that identifies food service transaction

element.name: Amounts
element.desc: Amount. This amount refers to the funds being directed inwards/ outwards from the customer's account. That is: these amounts reflect the changes to the account balances.

element.name: Description
element.desc: Description

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies the payment

element.name: FoodserviceTransactionRefId
element.desc: GUID that identifies food service transaction

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: Type of amount. The currency unit is implied; namely USD. Note that when this common element is used not all of the following values apply. There are notes to indicate values that are applicable.

attribute.name: Credits
attribute.desc: Number of credits. This attribute does not apply to Cash or Value and hence has a value 0. It only applies to types BreakfastCredit and LunchCredit.

attribute.name: Currency
attribute.desc: Currency code. Where omitted, defaults to implementation-defined local currency, typically USD in the United States.

element.name: MealStatus
element.desc: The student's meal status. Note that as this status is historical, StartDate and EndDate together, and/or SchoolYear MUST be included. If SchoolYear is included, StartDate and EndDate should not cross school year boundaries, i.e. in addition to multiple statuses being a possibility in a given school year, the same status may be repeated so StartDate and EndDate don't disagree with SchoolYear, if included.

attribute.name: FoodserviceItemPortionRefId
attribute.desc: GUID of FoodserviceItemPortion object

element.name: Value
element.desc: The value of item quantity

element.name: Cost
element.desc: The cost (dollar value) of the item sold.

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: Meal status type.

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: Date on which meal status became effective (inclusive).

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: Date on which meal status was last in effect. This attribute is conditional upon the StartDate element. It exists only if the StartDate element exists.

element.name: SchoolYear
element.desc: School year for which the information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g., 2004 for the 2003-04 school year).

attribute.name: FoodserviceItemPortionRefId
attribute.desc: Item portion amount

element.name: Value
element.desc: The price value

attribute.name: FoodserviceItemPortionRefId
attribute.desc: Item portion amount

attribute.name: Earned
attribute.desc: Identifies whether the item being purchased is earned i.e., at no cost to the buyer. It is used when FoodserviceTransaction object's TransactionType element has the value "Purchase".

attribute.name: SevereNeed
attribute.desc: Severe need identifier for the rate. When SevereNeed is Yes then the rate shown is the combined rate. For certain programs the severe need identifier does not apply. In such cases the value NA should be used.

element.name: Value
element.desc: The rate value

element.name: Rate
element.desc: Reimbursement rate of the meal

element.name: Value
element.desc: The value of sale quantity

element.name: SaleUnit
element.desc: Unit of Sale

element.name: ChargeToChild
element.desc: Charge to child per unit

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: Type of SalesAmount. This denotes the form of incoming funds for the sales done.

attribute.name: AccountType
attribute.desc: Type of account to which sales amounts apply. This is set to NA when Type is set as Earned.

element.name: SalesAmount
element.desc: Dollar value

attribute.name: StaffPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The GUID of the staff to whom this object is linked.

element.name: LastBreakfastDate
element.desc: Last breakfast served date

element.name: LastLunchDate
element.desc: Last lunch served date

object.name: StudentMeal
object.desc: This object contains information about the meal status of a student.

attribute.name: StudentPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The GUID of the student to whom this object is linked.

element.name: HistoricalMealStatus
element.desc: Optionally provides the meal status of the student historically.

element.name: LastBreakfastDate
element.desc: Date of the last reimbursable breakfast served.

element.name: LastLunchDate
element.desc: Date of the last reimbursable lunch served.

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: This refers to the way the payment was made.

element.name: Amounts
element.desc: AmountThis amount is the form of the incoming funds for this transaction. For example; the payment can be made by a credit card.

element.name: TransactionType
element.desc: Type of transaction
